Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lawndale/32nd
ShortDescription: SB 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/32nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 31st, Central Park, 26th, and Lawndale due to, street blockage near Lawndale/32nd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
